header.title: Let's build something together
header.description: Do you have a project, an idea or simply want to say hi? Write to me and let's talk.

status.warning: Set up EmailJS in the .env file to enable automatic sending.
status.success: Message sent successfully. Thanks for reaching out!
status.error: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again.

sidebar.title: Direct information
sidebar.note: I try to respond as quickly as possible. Tell me about your idea related to cybersecurity, web development, artificial intelligence, or similar fields, and we can work together.
